samples.question: Are there any differences between how Vietnamese name their children now and in the past?
samples.transcript: Let me think about it. So in the past, we were influenced by a lot of fortune teller. So some of us just pick the names for our children based on what we are advised by the fortune teller without choosing the names for our own children. But the young generation these days, they have more of an open-minded and they want the children to bear the name that is meaningful to the whole family rather than just listen to some strangers. I think that is the biggest difference. Thank you Now let move on to part two of the test So I will give you a topic and.
samples.transcript_original: Hmm, let me think about it. So in the past, we were influenced by a lot of fortune teller. So some of us just pick the names for our children based on what we are advised by the fortune teller without choosing the names for our own children. But the young generation these days, they have more of an open-minded and they want um, the children to bear the name that's meaningful to the whole family rather than just listen to some strangers. I think that's the biggest difference. Thank you Now let move on to part two of the test So I will give you a topic and.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Let me think about it. So in the past, we were influenced by a lot of fortune teller. So some of us just pick the names for our children based on what we are advised by the fortune teller without choosing the names for our own children. But the young generation these days, they have more of an open-minded and they want the children to bear the name that is meaningful to the whole family rather than just listen to some strangers. I think that is the biggest difference.

samples.question: So that is the way of her to stay anonymous, right?
samples.transcript: And however, I think she is, her influence is huge. and she will become more popular on the internet, I believe. so what is interesting about her fashion choice is that there are three principles behind her videos. the first one is that you do not have to splurge a ton on designer clothes in order to be fashionable. And the second one is that you can always be more creative and imaginative with your wardrobe. Mix and match your, the items that you have already got. And the third point is that, you know, for some people going to the office, dress nicely is such a daunting task. But to hers, she makes it so effortless and she enjoys the process of choosing items, what to wear. And she is radiate this really positive energy and attitude in small things that happen in your life. Yeah, which is great. I hope she get more famous soon. So you have just talked about a person who dresses fashionably. And in this third part of the test, I would like to ask you some more general questions related to this.

samples.question: So first of all, do you think that online shopping will replace in-store shopping in the future?
samples.transcript: And why? Well seeing the trend in the e platforms these days I believe that online shopping will somewhat takes over the traditional way of shopping in the near future the reason being that it makes shopping a lot more accessible no matter where you are or what time of the day you are going to shop right It just like one a few clicks away from getting the items that you want and a few more days to get it delivered which is really convenient for our daily lives Why is fashion very important to some people? So you can make a statement, through what you wear through and it represent yourself as a person to the public. and it also a way for you to show your attitude, whether you confident or you want to, promote a certain messages with your clothing. So I think, yeah.

samples.question: Are women more fashionable than men?
samples.transcript: Why? Totally agree with this one. because women, we are, we make emotional decisions. So we, we are not as fixed as men in terms of buying our daily, clothing items. So we are more easily influenced by trends. So up front we would look more trendy and fashionable and yeah, more relevant than the guys with one style for years and years. Thank you.

samples.question: What do you like about where you live?
samples.transcript: Well, talking about what I like the most about where I live, I must say that the hospitality of the people there It really makes me feel like warm and well very welcome. Like their friendliness always make me feel like home and they are always there for me.

samples.question: What changes would you like to see in your neighborhood?

samples.question: How many public holidays do you have in Vietnam?
samples.transcript: Well, I must say that there are number of holidays in Vietnam. for example, the mid-autumn or the Tet holiday, Which are like the highlights of our days and years because in these holidays we have days off and we can spend time with our family.
samples.transcript_original: Well, I must say that there are um, number of holidays in Vietnam. Uh, for example, the mid-autumn or the Tet holiday, Which are like the highlights of our days and years because um, in these holidays we have days off and we can spend time with our family.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I must say that there are number of holidays in Vietnam. for example, the mid-autumn or the Tet holiday, Which are like the highlights of our days and years because in these holidays we have days off and we can spend time with our family.

samples.question: Which holiday is your favorite?
samples.transcript: Well, I must say that Ted's holiday is one of my favorite holidays in the year because in Ted's holiday we have a long period of time to take our days off from school. And my parents also have days off so we can spend a long vacation in other countries or we just can come to a home town to meet our long distance relatives and we can have family meals. And I really appreciate those times.

samples.question: Do you think that people need more public holidays?
samples.transcript: Well, I have to say that we do not need any more holidays in our country because as I said before, we all, we already have a lot of holidays and people need to spend more time working, I guess. And of me, for me personally, I do not need more holidays.

samples.question: How often do you buy gifts for others?
samples.transcript: So I don usually buy gifts because I see it as a waste of money And I guess that I do buy gifts but on a very special occasions For example, I am away from my home for a long time. I want to buy them some souvenirs to make them feel happy when seeing me after such a long time. Or I guess that if I have to buy the gift, it must be someone very special in my life.

samples.question: First of all, why do some people have no interest in history?

samples.question: Why is it that sometimes events from the past were not recorded accurately?
